DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Efficacy Safety PF-04523655 Versus Laser Subjects With Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.detailed_description: DEGAS termination decision date December 17 , 2010 . Rationale : objective study could longer achieve . The study terminate safety .
DOC.criteria: Patients Diabetes Mellitus ( Type 1 Type 2 ) Showing Diabetic Macular Edema Eye . Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy Study Eye . Subjects Receiving Concomitant Intravitreal AntiVEGF Therapy .
